text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text: The first day of training with Super<n>Creek officially begins.

text_block_list.name: Super Creek
text_block_list.text:
Hehe, I'm suuuper excited to see<n>what kind of plan you
made for me.

text_block_list.name: Super Creek
text_block_list.text: Let's do our best, Trainer!

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text:
"A rookie trainer is still a trainer." Her<n>words echo in my
mind as I remind<n>myself of the responsibility I now<n>have.
choice_data_list: All right, let's get to it!

text_block_list.name: Super Creek
text_block_list.text: Great, I'm looking forward to it! ♪

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text: We start our training. A few hours<n>later...

text_block_list.name: Super Creek
text_block_list.text: Phew... I finished all ten laps.

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text:
I designed the training plan based on<n>her performance at
tryouts.

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text:
But looking at how exhausted she is,<n>I think I already
pushed her too hard.

text_block_list.name: Super Creek
text_block_list.text: I'm sorry that it took me so long to<n>finish.
choice_data_list:
No, it's my fault for not understanding your
limits...

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text:
I explain that since becoming Super<n>Creek's trainer, I may
have gotten<n>ahead of myself. I need to come back<n>down
to earth.

text_block_list.name: Super Creek
text_block_list.text: Hehe, you're doing well.

text_block_list.name: Super Creek
text_block_list.text:
Don't worry. As we get to know each<n>other better, things
will smooth out in<n>the future.

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text:
Once again, I'm moved by the fact<n>that this incredibly kind
and talented<n>student partnered up with me.

text_block_list.name: Tamamo Cross
text_block_list.text: ...What are ya guys doin' in the<n>middle of the track, huh?

text_block_list.name: Super Creek
text_block_list.text: Why hello there, Tamtam!

text_block_list.name: Super Creek
text_block_list.text: Trainer, allow me to introduce you to<n>my friend, Tamtam.

text_block_list.name: Tamamo Cross
text_block_list.text:
It's Tamamo Cross, ya hear?! If<n>you're gonna introduce
me, then do it<n>right, yeah?!

text_block_list.name: Tamamo Cross
text_block_list.text:
Anyway, I came over here 'cause I<n>heard ya got yourself a
trainer...

text_block_list.name: Tamamo Cross
text_block_list.text: And I can see ya already gettin' all<n>pampered up.

text_block_list.name: Tamamo Cross
text_block_list.text:
That's right—it doesn't matter who ya<n>are, Creek'll do her
thing. She just<n>loves takin' care of the people<n>'round her.

text_block_list.name: Super Creek
text_block_list.text: Hehe. It's true—my family runs a day<n>care center.

text_block_list.name: Super Creek
text_block_list.text:
Since I've spent so much time<n>looking after children, it's
become a<n>habit of mine now.

text_block_list.name: Tamamo Cross
text_block_list.text:
Huh, so that's why ya like goin'<n>'round bein' a mom to
everyone.<n>Makes sense now.

text_block_list.name: Tamamo Cross
text_block_list.text:
...Hang on a sec. Don't tell me ya see<n>me as one of your lil'
kids too?

text_block_list.name: Super Creek
text_block_list.text:
Hmm... Sometimes I do, but I also<n>think you're mature in
your own way.

text_block_list.name: Tamamo Cross
text_block_list.text:
Sometimes! ...I could say lotsa things<n>'bout that, but
whatever. Creek's one<n>of my besties, yeah?

text_block_list.name: Tamamo Cross
text_block_list.text:
That's why ya better not get too<n>spoiled and slack off now!
Make sure<n>ya watch her carefully!

text_block_list.name: Super Creek
text_block_list.text:
Aww, you're leaving already? Come<n>back and visit again,
okay? ♪

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text:
Tamamo Cross is right. I'm not here<n>to mess around—I'm
here to help<n>Super Creek achieve her best run.

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text:
And I'm going to keep working hard<n>to be a trainer who
takes care of my<n>students—not the other way around!

text_block_list.name: Super Creek
text_block_list.text:
Good work today, Trainer. I'm looking<n>forward to
tomorrow's training!

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text:
A large stack of instant noodle<n>containers stands in Super
Creek's<n>line of vision.

text_block_list.name: Super Creek
text_block_list.text: Are you always eating instant<n>noodles?

text_block_list.name: Super Creek
text_block_list.text:
Hm... You won't get enough vitamins<n>if you don't eat your
vegetables.

text_block_list.name: Super Creek
text_block_list.text:
How about I cook you something for<n>dinner tonight? I'll
bring it to you later.<n>♪

text_block_list.name: Super Creek
text_block_list.text: In that case, I'll head out now—huh?

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text:
Super Creek catches a glimpse of my<n>tracksuit lying in a
crumpled heap.

text_block_list.name: Super Creek
text_block_list.text: Do you often leave your clothes out<n>like this?

text_block_list.name: Super Creek
text_block_list.text: It'll get all wrinkly if you don't hang it<n>up properly.

text_block_list.name: Super Creek
text_block_list.text:
I'll iron it for you this time, so make<n>sure to be careful in the
future, okay?<n>♪

text_block_list.name: Super Creek
text_block_list.text: ...Oh my! There are magazines<n>everywhere.

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text:
Before I even have a chance to show<n>my dependable side,
Super Creek is<n>already picking up after me.
